name: Arthur Morgan
title: You're alright, boy.
text: Spent half the morning brushing the horses. Worth every minute. Good boy.

name: Hosea Matthews
title: I’m too old for this nonsense
text: Dutch thinks this is all going to work out. I don’t know about that, Dutch…

name: Micah Bell
title: Where’s my goddamn money?
text: I swear, every time I ask Strauss about the accounts, he gives me that look.

name: John Marston
title: Trying my best
text: Jack keeps asking about school. Maybe someday… when we’re done running.

name: Sadie Adler
title: Ride or die
text: Folks underestimate me. Let them. Makes it easier.

name: Dutch van der Linde
title: I HAVE A PLAN
text: All we need… is *one* more score.

name: Charles Smith
title: Keeping things steady
text: Hunted some deer today. Shared the meat with the camp. Felt right.

name: Lenny Summers
title: LENNY!
text: Can’t go anywhere without Arthur yelling my name like he lost me in a saloon.

name: Susan Grimshaw
title: Camp discipline
text: If folks don’t start cleaning up after themselves, I’m throwing half their junk in the river.

name: Arthur Morgan
title: I don’t know about that, Dutch…
text: Every time he says 'one more score' I feel my soul leave my body.
